segments.text: I really want to go to the beach this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like fun . What's the weather going to be like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard that it's going to be warm this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it going to be perfect beach weather ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I hope it doesn't cool off this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . I really want to go to the beach .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you know that California weather is really unpredictable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right . One minute it's hot , and then the next minute it's cold .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really wish the weather would just stay the same .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I do too . That way we can have our activities planned ahead of time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , that would make things a lot easier .
segments.speaker: S2
